name: email-links-monorepo
description: Monorepo for email link extractor and cached HTTP client library

scripts.build: bun run build:lib && bun run build:api
scripts.build:lib: bun run build:task && bun run build:env && bun run build:core && bun run build:domain && bun run build:cached-http && bun run build:browser-scraper
scripts.it: bun run test:integration:notion && bun run test:integration:twitter
scripts.it:twitter: echo 'Running Twitter integration tests...' && bun run src/infrastructure/tests/integration/twitter/test-twitter-enrichment.ts
scripts.ci:local: bun run ci:typecheck && bun run ci:lint && bun run ci:build && bun run test:unit
scripts.ci:typecheck: bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p packages/platform-core/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p packages/browser-scraper/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p packages/platform-task/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p packages/platform-domain/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p packages/platform-sdk/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p packages/platform-db/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p packages/platform-utils/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p packages/cached-http-client/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p apps/api/tsconfig.json && bun --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck -p apps/cli/tsconfig.json
scripts.ci:build: bun run build && cd apps/dashboard && bun run build && cd ../cli && bun run build
